name: Meeting Insights Analyzer
summary: Analyzes meeting transcripts and notes to extract key insights, action items, decisions, and follow-ups with organized summaries
when_to_use: User has meeting transcripts to analyze
User wants to extract action items from meetings
User wants to identify key decisions
User needs to organize meeting follow-ups
User wants insights from meeting discussions
when_not_to_use: User wants general document analysis (use doc-coauthoring)
